mapper.sql: UserOrderId, UserId, TotalPrice, Status, OrderAddressId, PayId, Remark, OrderTime, PayTime, BranchUserId, OrderTotalPrice, PayType, OrderType, AgentUserId, IsBranch, ExpressCom, ExpressOrder
mapper.select:
select
from O_UserOrders where UserId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by OrderTime desc

select
from O_UserOrders where AgentUserId = #{agentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status=2 and IsBranch=0 order by PayTime desc

select
from O_UserOrders where BranchUserId = #{branchUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by PayTime,OrderTime desc
